Earn Your Data Modeling Certificate

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Certificate, Chicago, Data Models, IL, TDWI

The Data Modeling Certificate will build your skills and get you started with emerging techniques to model the complex structures in big data and NoSQL databases. Save 30% thru Mar 17 with code KDNEWS.


Earn Your Data Modeling Certificate


TDWI Chicago offers a 4-day Intensive on Data Modeling Methods and Techniques Designed to Advance Your Career

May 7-12, 2017 | Chicago Hilton

The Data Modeling Certificate will build your skills with established data modeling methods and get you started with emerging techniques to model the complex structures found in big data and NoSQL databases.

Complete the following courses and you will receive a certificate of completion from TDWI and 32 Continuing Professional Education (CPE) credits.

Save 30% through March 17 with code: KDNEWS

  • Mon: Dimensional Modeling from a Business Perspective: A Model the Business Can Understand
  • Tue: TDWI Dimensional Data Modeling Primer: From Requirements to Business Analysis
  • Wed: Dimensional Modeling Beyond the Basics: Intermediate and Advanced Techniques
  • Thu: Data Modeling in the Age of Big Data

TDWI Certificates are a great way to gain topical knowledge quickly so you use it day-one back at the office to advance your team projects, get that promotion or boost your resume. TDWI keeps a comprehensive database of all of our certificate alumni so we can verify the authenticity of your professional development.

Why TDWI Chicago?
TDWI events aren't like other conferences. Walk away with actionable insights from hands-on training and face the challenges and opportunities of data-driven organizations. In one week and at one location, you will have access to the most comprehensive coverage of topics expert instructors who know how to turn those mountains of data into impactful business decisions.

Take a look at our full agenda of more than 55 courses to see how you can accelerate your career and drive project success by learning from the legendary TDWI faculty.

LEARN MORE

KDnuggets readers can save 30% through
Friday March 17 with priority code: KDNEWS
